attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
The data relating to real estate for sale on this web site comes in part from the Broker Reciprocity Program of GAMLS. All real estate listings are marked with the GAMLS Broker Reciprocity thumbnail logo and detailed information about them includes the name of the listing brokers.
The broker providing these data believes them to be correct, but advises interested parties to confirm them before relying on them in a purchase decision.

data.description: BACK ON MARKET AT NO FAULT OF SELLER. FHA APPRAISAL HAS BEEN COMPLETED. Seller will provide $5,000 towards closing cost with full price offer. Welcome to this stunning 4 bed, 2 1/2 bath home nestled in the desirable Creekview Heights subdivision in Covington, GA. This beautifully designed residence boasts spacious living areas, traditional finishes, and an abundance of natural light. The open-concept kitchen features brand new flooring and stainless steel appliances. Enjoy the comfort of a cozy fireplace in the family room and a separate formal dining area for gatherings. The primary bedroom suite offers a private oasis with an en-suite bathroom, complete with a luxurious soaking tub and a walk-in shower. Three additional well-appointed bedrooms provide ample space for family or guests. Sold with a 1 year home warranty. There have been many updates completed since the original photos including new flooring on the main level replacing all of the lower level vinyl flooring in the photos, fresh paint, and new gutters. Don't miss the chance to make this lovely home yours!
